title: Sampler
medium:
Medium: silk and linen embroidery on linen foundation
Technique: embroidered in eyelet, satin, back, double running, cross, montenegrin, four-sided, and overcasting stitches, with two bands of withdrawn element work with needlemade fillings, looping, wrapping, and interlacing, on plain weave foundation.
description: Bands of pattern in polychrome, white and withdrawn element work.
name: Sampler
